/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars and bicycles are parked along the sides of the street, adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the entire scene. The colors in the image are mostly gray and green, reflecting the typical urban landscape of Beijing.
